data.author: Cavemen

changelog.release_notes:
Improved initial update stability
- Initial update now performed automatically after 2 secs; this should resolve any 'infinite update' issues when starting the app
- Using more aggressive GPS settings (10 sec timeout, 10 sec data age) to improve accuracy

If you should detect any issues, please contact us through the app's github.com page by posting an issue. Thank you!

Added several new features:
  - can now manually choose from the closest bus stops ('*' next to bus stop name on main page indicates manual selection)
    1. press middle button to go to selection screen
    2. up/down to select
    3. middle button to confirm selection
 - now showing up to 21 next buses (7 per page, use up/down buttons to flip pages)
 - shake watch to trigger update
 - different bus lines are highlighted by individual background colors to allow for faster scanning of next buses list
 - improved update status info
 - updates now triggered automatically every 30 seconds

data.description:
Gives bus schedule info for the ASEAG bus network (Aachen, Germany region).

Functionality:
  - Shows up to 21 next buses (7 per page)
    - Use up/down buttons to flip pages
  - Select between automatic or manual bus stop selection ('*' next to bus stop name on main screen indicates manual selection)
    1. Press middle button to go to selection screen
    2. Select desired bus stop using up/down buttons
    3. Confirm selection using middle button
  - Shake watch to trigger update (automatic trigger every 30 seconds)
  - Color highlights for every bus stop line for faster scanning of list

Improved initial update stability

If you should detect any issues, please contact us through the app's github.com page by posting an issue. Thank you!
